name: The Dress
description:
What makes a girl feel more like a princess than a new frilly summer dress?

A short visual novel about a young woman on a summer day.

It can be completed within 3 - 5 minutes.

_____________________________________

Created in about 6 days for Narrative Driven Jam #2

Theme: Unreliable Narrator I No additional themes were used

_____________________________________

Credits:

Written and illustrated by myself

Audio: 魔王魂 Font: ラノベPOP V2

Created with Ren'py 7.3

_____________________________________

Let me know what you think!

Feel free to leave feedback in the comments and rate the game based on

your experience to help me improve my upcoming visual novel projects.
